Form

Forms can be composed of input, select, textform elements, and other specialized input elements, such as checkboxes, and radio buttons. The first example shows all the form-controls available in one single form.

Simple Form

The class names and syntax for the default form are as follows : 

    
<form class="form ">
    <div class="form-column">
        <input type="text" class="form-field"></>
    </div>
     <div class="form-column">
         <textarea  class="form-textarea"></>
     </div>
</form>
